clip.quote: In 2024, year to date, she has made $60,000 in commissions directly through social media.
clip.why_clipworthy: Highlights the tangible financial benefits of effective social media use.
clip.suggested_hook: Want to turn your social media into a money-making machine?

clip.quote: Someone I hadn't seen in 10 years reached out to me. They want to buy a house with me.
clip.why_clipworthy: Demonstrates the power of staying top of mind through social media.
clip.suggested_hook: Reconnect with old contacts and turn them into clients!

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK": "Reconnect with old contacts and turn them into clients!",
    "SETUP": "Kim Rittberg shares a powerful story about the impact of staying top of mind through social media.",
    "INSIGHT": "Someone I hadn't seen in 10 years reached out to me. They want to buy a house with me. This is the power of consistent video content. By sharing your journey and expertise online, you remain in people's minds, even if you haven't spoken in years.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "This matters because your next client could be someone from your past. Use social media to nurture those connections and keep your network engaged.",
```
